snippet: Escaping a brutal home, this protagonist models herself on inspiring fictional characters.
abstract: Lenora Todaro reviews young adult book The Hired Girl by Laura Amy Schlitz.
lead_paragraph: Escaping a brutal home, this protagonist models herself on inspiring fictional characters.

headline.main: ‘The Hired Girl,’ by Laura Amy Schlitz
headline.print_headline: ‘As Bravely as a Heroine in a Novel’
